channel.title: (BOUNTY FOR FIX) Remmina not connecting to RDP
channel.description:
I get this error message in my terminal when I run remmina as Sudo. It won't connect to my RDP and even if I run without sudo it won't connect. https://pastebin.com/f49KGhs5
Cannot connect to the "xxx.xxx.xxx.xxx" RDP server. << The message I get.
If anyone has a solution I would happily send you some coin for your troubles. Should I reinstall whonix? I have tried everything that people replied to me on my last thread: https://forums.whonix.org/t/remmina-rdp-client-broken-it-seems-need-help-asap-please/

item.title: (BOUNTY FOR FIX) Remmina not connecting to RDP
item.dc:creator: mikey233
item.description:
I get this error message in my terminal when I run remmina as Sudo.
It won’t connect to my RDP and even if I run without sudo it won’t connect.

Pastebin

sudo remmina[sudo] password for user: Remmina plugin glibsecret (typ...

Pastebin.com is the number one paste tool since 2002. Pastebin is a website where you can store text online for a set period of time.

Cannot connect to the “xxx.xxx.xxx.xxx” RDP server. << The message I get.

If anyone has a solution I would happily send you some coin for your troubles.
Should I reinstall whonix?
I have tried everything that people replied to me on my last thread: https://forums.whonix.org/t/remmina-rdp-client-broken-it-seems-need-help-asap-please/
